function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Bacterial communities in dust collected from 155 spaces","Impact":"Potential risk of spreading bacterial infections","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and disinfection, improving ventilation and air filtration systems","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UV germicidal irradiation, HVAC systems with high-efficiency filters","People":"Building occupants, visitors, maintenance staff","Owner":"Building management, maintenance staff"},{"Description":"Thin building design allowing most rooms access to outside air directly through windows and louvers","Impact":"Increased risk of outdoor air contamination entering the building","Mitigation":"Improving air sealing and filtration, regular maintenance of windows and louvers","Technologies":"Air quality monitors, weatherproofing materials, automatic window controls","People":"Building occupants, visitors","Owner":"Building management, maintenance staff"},{"Description":"Central atrium used for exhausting air through stack ventilation","Impact":"Inefficient ventilation leading to poor indoor air quality and potential spread of airborne contaminants","Mitigation":"Improving stack ventilation system, regular maintenance and cleaning of ventilation infrastructure","Technologies":"Ventilation fans, air quality sensors, HVAC system upgrades","People":"Building occupants, visitors","Owner":"Building management, maintenance staff"}]}
